Paystand | Full Stack, Sr. Frontend Engineers | ONSITE | Guadalajara, Mexico | Full-time

PayStand’s mission is to use modern Internet, Blockchain and SaaS technologies to transform B2B payments. Our revolutionary “Payments as a Service” model creates a smart billing and payment network that can digitize receivables, automate processing, reduce time-to-cash, lower transaction costs and enable new revenue.

Although Paystand's HQ are Silicon Valley, we are building an Engineering team in Guadalajara. At this time all our positions are ONSITE (no remote).

We are looking for:

Full Stack Engineers

Senior Frontend Engineers
